## ChunkLattice.getBlockTypeCount() method

Get the number of blocks of a specific block type in the lattice.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getBlockTypeCount(blockTypeId: number): number;
```

</th><th>

The block type id to get the count of.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
